newsitem.title: USA: Nebraska fed cattle light at $104/dressed - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Nebraska fed cattle light at $104/dressed - USDA.

text.p: Slaughter steers and heifers were steady, USDA said. Demand and seller interest fair-good.

Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1200-1300 lbs - 104.00, pen predominately Choice 105.00. Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1075-1200 lbs - 104.00. Sales confirmed - 2,000 For the week - 69,000
Live basis sales - Equivalent 3 percent shrink delivered and FOB, some FOB 4% shrink. Dressed basis delivered (paid on hot carcass weights)
